Constructor Detail

ClientDriverFactory

public ClientDriverFactory()
Method Detail

createClientDriver

public ClientDriver createClientDriver()
Factory method to create and start a ClientDriver. A port will be chosen automatically.

Returns:
A new ClientDriver, which has found a free port, bound to it and started up.

createClientDriver

public ClientDriver createClientDriver(int port)
Factory method to create and start a ClientDriver on a specific port. This is absolutely not the recommended way to use the client driver. The no-arg method will choose a free port, use of this method will fail if the port is not free.

Parameters:
port - The port to listen on. If this port is not available a runtime exception will be thrown.
Returns:
A new ClientDriver, which has found a free port, bound to it and started up.
